interface.name: dbus_stub
interface.summary: DBUS stub interface. No access allowed.

template.name: dbus_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the dbus module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domain which is used for the user dbus.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: dbus_system_bus_client_template
template.summary: Template for creating connections to the system DBUS.

param.name: domain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

template.name: dbus_user_bus_client_template
template.summary: Template for creating connections to a user DBUS.

param.name: user_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: domain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

template.name: dbus_send_user_bus
template.summary: Send a message on user/application specific DBUS.

param.name: domain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: dbus_connect_system_bus
interface.summary: Connect to the the system DBUS for service (acquire_svc).

interface.name: dbus_send_system_bus
interface.summary: Send a message on the system DBUS.

interface.name: dbus_system_bus_unconfined
interface.summary: Allow unconfined access to the system DBUS.
